banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: The future of food

nodes.whoTheyAre: Since joining BCG in 1980, Michael Silverstein has served in a number of leadership roles, most recently as leader of BCG’s client service initiative and as a member of the firm’s Executive Committee. Michael specializes in helping large multinationals transform their companies through superior consumer insight, accelerated organic growth and M&A. He is the author and co-author of “Trading Up,” “Treasure Hunt,” “Women Want More” and “The $10 Trillion Prize” on the newly affluent class in China and India.

videoData.description: As Asian diets increasingly shift to resemble typical Western palates, the food supply chain will be challenged to keep pace with the demand. Michael Silverstein reveals the trends in motion and offers strategic ideas on how to address these obstacles.
videoData.socialDescription: As Asian diets increasingly shift to resemble typical Western palates, the food supply chain will be challenged to keep pace with the demand. Michael Silverstein reveals the trends in motion and offers strategic ideas on how to address these obstacles.
